description:
exp/locale: proposed API for Locale plus example tables.go.
Note that Locale allows the user access to the collator
used by the locale so that the user can tweak some of the more
advanced sorting options or use the Collator directly.

messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

subject: code review 6297099: exp/locale: proposed API for Locale plus example tables.go.
